title: Chargebee | SDE 1 | Bangalore | Offer
content:
**Education**: B. Tech from an NIT (Batch 2019-2023)
**Years of Experience**: 1 year
**Prior Experience**:  SDE 1 at well known startup
**Previous CTC**: 22 LPA (18 Base)
**Company**: Chargebee
**Title/Level**: SDE - 1
**Location**: Bangalore, India
**Base**: 20 LPA
**RSUs (Resctricted Stock Units)** : 380 units
**Sign-on Bonus**: ₹ 0
**Bonus**: Performance-based bonus
**Total comp (Base + Perf bonus + RSUs + Sign-on Bonus + some Benefits):**  20 Lakhs

Interview Experience: https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5321340/Chargebee-or-Interview-Experience-or-SDE-1-or-Offer

title: Google Hardware Engineer L4
content:
Hi All,

Education: Bachelors in EE from tier 1 college(IIT)
Years of Experience: 10 years
Prior Experience: Firmware role in Product Based MNC in Bangalore(I am working remotely though)
Current CTC: 49L(45L Fixed base + 4L variable)

Company: Google
Title/Level: L4(Hardware Engineer Machine Learning)
Date of the Offer: June 2024
Location: Hyderabad

Base Salary: 38L
Bonus: 15%
Joining Bonus: 8L
RSU: $120K for 4 years

Is this a good offer? shall I consider joining L4 level with my experience ? I hear moving to L5 from L4 will be tough.
